# Roman Lenjo Portfolio

> A product designer's portfolio showcasing case studies, thoughts, and creative work. Designing for humans with a focus on user experience, product strategy, and visual design.

## Main Pages
- [Home](https://roml3n.xyz/) - Portfolio homepage with featured projects and tool stack
- [About](https://roml3n.xyz/about) - Personal information, experience, and reading list
- [Work](https://roml3n.xyz/work) - Portfolio of selected work and case studies
- [Writing](https://roml3n.xyz/writing) - Blog posts and thoughts on design and product
- [Photos](https://roml3n.xyz/photos) - Photography gallery

## Case Studies
- [Bigstore](https://roml3n.xyz/work/bigstore) - E-commerce redesign for The CB Group
- [Pawa Website](https://roml3n.xyz/work/pawa-website) - Marketing website redesign for Pawa IT
- [Tucheze](https://roml3n.xyz/work/tucheze) - Sports betting platform design for The CB Group
- [Waya SSN](https://roml3n.xyz/work/waya-ssn) - Non-SSN signup flow for Waya financial services

## Blog Posts
Dynamic content from Sanity CMS - includes design thoughts, case study insights, and industry commentary.

## Social Media
- [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/roml3n) - Professional network and career updates
- [Behance](https://behance.net/roml3n) - Design portfolio and creative projects
- [Dribbble](https://dribbble.com/roml3n) - Design inspiration and community
- [Medium](https://medium.com/@romlen) - Design thinking and industry insights
- [X (Twitter)](https://x.com/roml3n) - Quick thoughts and design updates
- [Threads](https://threads.net/@roml3n) - Casual design discussions

## Technical Information
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **CMS**: Sanity for blog content
- **Deployment**: Vercel
- **Analytics**: Vercel Analytics and Google Analytics
- **Last Updated**: 2024-12-19
